summary: The Highland Hall is a large player house located north-east of Whiterun. It contains every facility that the Dovahkiin could need.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

The hall can serve as your base of operations in Skyrim as it contains all player facilities in one easy to reach location. 

The hall contains: 

-Portals to all major cities! (NEW)
-Merchants 
-A luxury bedroom (with walk-in wardrobe!) 
-A temple (containing all shrines) 
-Crafting facilities (including a skooma lab!) 
-Lots of followers (with different combat styles!) 
-Storage facilities! 
-A personal bard! 
-pets! 
-new spells

NEW SPELLS HAVE BEEN ADDED AVAILABLE AT THE HALL MERCHANT:
-Storm Strike - sends a powerful bolt of lightning towards the enemy which will knock them down or send them flying.
-Summon Storm Bear - summons a bear spirit who will charge your opponents and blast them with a stormy explosion
-Summon Highland Spirit - summons a highland guardian who will channel lightning at your opponent providing a helpful distraction.
-Fist of Talos - Causes a stormy explosion around the caster blasting back all enemies with lightning damage.




Note:

This is my first mod and I will still be coming back to improve it as I learn more. I plan to add quests related to the hall to make it into a sort of guild - eventually leading to some cool items. I am also planning to put in some voiced dialogue. 

I hope you like it and please let me know if you have any ideas for new content or things i need to change and please let me know if you find any bugs! 

Thanks!




Installation:

Simply unzip and stick the esp and bsa files into your skyrim/data file!

-To update - delete the old highland hall bsa and esm files and install the new ones through nexus or steam workshop!
author: Quaid
